text: Francesc Xavier Arnau Grabulosa (23 May 1975 - 22 May 2021) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He worked as a sporting director for Málaga and Real Oviedo. In a 16-year professional career he only played for Barcelona and Málaga, appearing in 126 La Liga games over the course of 12 seasons. Arnau died on 22 May 2021 in Oviedo, Spain one day before his 46th birthday.Muere Francesc Arnau, ex portero del Barça ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spanish businesspeople
title: Francesc Arnau
